generated.css: body{display:grid;grid-template-rows:auto auto 48px;height:100vh;font-family:Raleway}:root{--blueberry:#60579d;--dark-blueberry:#3a374e;--dark-bluberry-light:rgba(84,81,107,0.5);--petrol:#12a29b;--gray:#43a391}p{font-size:20px}a{color:#ee7600}a,a:hover{text-decoration:none}a:hover{color:#fff;background-color:#ee7600}.h1{font-family:Raleway;margin-top:20px;margin-bottom:10px}@media (max-width:576px){.h1{font-size:25px}}.h2{font-family:Raleway;font-size:32px;color:var(--petrol)}@media 0 3px var(--dark-blueberry);margin-bottom:20px}.header__button-group{margin-top:5px}.header__button-group a{text-decoration:none;border:.5px solid var(--blueberry);color:var(--petrol)}.header__button-group a:hover{color:var(--blueberry);box-shadow:inset 0 0 5px var(--dark-blueberry)}.bootcamp{grid-area:bootcamp;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:space-between;font-size:16px;padding:30px}@media (max-width:768px){.bootcamp{padding:25px 0}}.ref__card-image{border-top-left-radius:8px;border-top-right-radius:8px;width:100%}.ref__heading{align-self:flex-start}nav{z-index:1;box-shadow:0 0 3px
